skillTree.localised_description: The best of all horse breeds found anywhere in the world, Elven steeds are noble, intelligent, graceful, and swift.
An extremely light yet resilient material, Ithilmar gives the same protection as heavy steel, but without slowing down its wearer.
Ulthuan's Great Eagles are the firm allies of the Elves, fighting their causes since the coming of Chaos.
Isha's protection can protect the faithful Asur through the darkest of days.
Isha's blessing is only granted to the worthy - those who seek to protect life rather than take it.
Those of a fell heart will be destroyed if they receive the Everqueen's touch.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 when fighting against Vampire Counts, Vampire Coast and Tomb Kings
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Everqueen can banish the taint of Chaos with a single touch.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Norsca and Beastmen
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: While Alarielle herself is seen as a radical force, she is bound to certain ceremonial duties, which is reassuring for many Asur.
Elves are political creatures, but the Everqueen exists above such debased notions; when she speaks all listen and put aside petty machinations.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -10% for all buildings
	(local province)

skillTree.localised_description: As a paragon of the Earth Mother and queen of Avelorn, growth and fortitude for the land itself is promoted.

effects.description:
Hero recruit rank: +1 for Handmaidens
	(all provinces)

Hero recruit rank: +2 for Handmaidens
	(all provinces)

skillTree.localised_description: The spiritual defence and well-being of the Elves is the traditional duty of the Everqueen.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +10 for Sisters of Avelorn units
	(local armies)

Recruitment duration: -1 turn for Sisters of Avelorn units (minimum 1)
	(all provinces)

skillTree.localised_description: The Everqueen does not traditionally go to war, but Alarielle is different - she will punish the invaders of Avelorn!
Representing the Isha and all the Gods of the Cadai, the Everqueen is a beacon of hope in these turbulent times.
A gift from Isha; no wounds are beyond Alarielle's skills and her wards of protection know no equal.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for Dryads, Tree Kin and Treeman units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +20 for Dryads, Tree Kin and Treeman units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: As guardian of the lands, the Everqueen can manipulate the Lores of Life and Light with unrivalled skill.

unit_ability.onscreen_name: Djaf's Incantation of Cursed Blades Upgraded

effects.description:
Melee attack: +9 for Forest Spirit units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Wizard draws wholesome energies from the soil, imbuing companions with the natural resilience of the earth.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Earth Blood"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Earth Blood Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Earth Blood Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Pha's Protection"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Pha's Protection Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Pha's Protection Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Even the simplest of spells can bring forth the full bloom of renewal, reinvigorating and healing the broken and bleeding.
Prickly gorse bursts from the ground around the caster's allies, protecting them from attack like a spiky, living shield.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Shield of Thorns"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Shield of Thorns Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Shield of Thorns Upgraded"

Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Banishment Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.
Turning an untrained bunch of regular citizens into effective fighting units requires a special kind of talent, and oodles of patience.

skillTree.localised_description: Missile combat isn't always about attacking; knowing how to defend also pays dividends.

skillTree.localised_description: Years of experience in mounted combat has started to pay off; this one is always in command of both their force and its steeds.

skillTree.localised_description: Being present at the very forefront of the assault, on many occasions, prepares one for future engagements of a similar nature.

skillTree.localised_description: The firmament holds no fear for this one, such is their command of the many airborne beasts of battle.

skillTree.localised_description: Knowing that it is the rare plan that survives contact with the enemy, yet being prepared for all eventualities, raises this one above mere planners.

skillTree.localised_description: Like a wall of the hardest stone imaginable - such is their ability to withstand attack.

skillTree.localised_description: When the gale always blows in the direction of your choosing, failure becomes a rare event indeed.

skillTree.localised_description: Speed, agility and control - all must be mastered if your crushing tide is to break perfectly upon enemy shores.

skillTree.localised_description: The very centre of the fire always burns the hottest.

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
She is the Radiant – Isha's chosen – her beauty radiating not merely from without but from within.
“Underlying most arguments against the free market is a lack of belief in freedom itself.”
The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.
The ancient Asur arts teach one how to heal as well as how to harm.

effects.description:
Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -8% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.
"The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.
This warrior has been ambushed previously and got themselves and many of their compatriots away safely. Such things make one naturally suspicious.
Far removed from the petty squabbles of other races, many High Elves are able to devote themselves to learning, magic and the arts.
All Asur adore the Everqueen, but Alarielle is especially beloved for her willingness to join warriors in battle.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: As Everqueen of all Asur, Alarielle is leader of Avelorn and Ulthuan’s spiritual head.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +15% for Sisters of Avelorn and Handmaiden units
	(Lord's army)
